name: Aluminium bromide

Aluminium bromide from 1967 In large ampoules

Appearance:
white to pale yellow
crystalline solid
Solubility in water: very soluble,partially hydrolyses indicated by a fuming soluton and an optional appearance of white precipitate
Solubility: slightly soluble in methanol, diethyl ether, acetone
